alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orange (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange and southern Caledonia Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth Corners, Orange, Corinth, Topsham, Washington, Vershire, Chelsea, Bradford, Groton, West Fairlee, South Corinth, Waits River, West Corinth, West Topsham, and East Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
